gaia.cu9.ari.gaiaorbit

Class GaiaSandbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • gaia.cu9.ari.gaiaorbit.GaiaSandbox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener, IObserver

    public class GaiaSandbox
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener, IObserver
    The main class. Holds all the entities manages the update/draw cycle as well as the image rendering.
    Author:
    Toni Sagrista
